review: That's good and bad. I like the Apple TV because I can stream directly off my iPad. I realize, though, that these are two competing operating systems. And this is less than 1/2 the cost of the Apple TV. Great item! I have two in my house along with the Apple TV and use these more. Plus it compensates for my smart TV's actually being a very stupid TV. Nothing ever works well with that feature. What gives?
author: Brian Richardson

review: Bought it for my husband for Christmas and he loved it , so bought 3 more as gifts! I'm sure they will like it also
author: J. Frey

review: This product is limited, slow and a waste of your money....do not get it. We bought this because using YouTube on our TV was a drag; clicking and clicking search info was a drag. The Chromecast seemed like a good idea but trying to watch a film from YouTube was extremely frustrating: it was slow, kept cutting out, the communication between the device and the laptop kept cutting out. The set-up was also difficult. There are no real instructions for getting the device up and running. Its too frustrating to even write about it, just forget it and look at other options. Its just a quick way for Google or who ever is making it, to make a quick buck on something you may use once or twice before tossing out or giving away. We are very unhappy with this purchase.
author: KimmerO

review: When you want to watch or share a video or app from your smart phone or tablet, this device allows you to do it on a large format TV so you can see more detail or enjoy it with others.  A little cumbersome to get connected, but once done, you take the device with you and plug in to any HDMI port for large screen display of your content.  Excellent product for a low price.
